::Demise/EndBringer/Scyther::

Demise smiles, about to sink his claws when a missile smashes into 
his back and sends him flying forward, another missile helping him 
along. An energy discharge from Tankorr barely misses his back as he 
crashes to the ground, skidding a few feet.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
EndBringer dives out of Tankorr's way as the tank drives by, firing a 
missile launcher after the vehicon.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Scyther moves to avoid the shots, but his foot slips on the ice. Two 
shots sail past him, a third one hitting his shoulder and sending him 
spinning.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>        Rampage sees a burst of light just as he is sent tumbling 
over the 
> cliff side. Thinking the worst, and thinking the end, he suddenly 
launched a 
> grappling hook, the same hook he once used to pull the Axalon off 
of its 
> pearch and into a watery grave. It soared into the air and sank 
into a large 
> glaciar nearby. Dangling from the rope, he glances down to see a 
river of 
> ice, one so thick it would most likely kill him if he were to fall.
>        "Argh! Demise, I truly under estimated you..." He said, and 
using all 
> of his remaining strength pulled himself back up. As he pulls 
himself back 
> onto solid ground, he can see the engagememnts taking place all 
around him. 
> And then sees a pair of his back mounted crab legs lying in the 
snow. Must 
> have snapped off....
>        With missle launcher in hand, he aims at the large bot, and 
fires with 
> intense rage that only a bot like Rmapage could house in his 
twisted spark.
> 
>        Inferno sees Demise coming, but he didnt expect it. Caught 
off gaurd 
> he is sent to the ground as the bot tackles him. "Ahh!" He manages 
to groan 
> under the massive bots weight.
> 
>        Tankkor once agian goes on a slow march to crush Endbringer 
when his 
> stry missle nails him under his head, sending is tank turret 
spining and 
> discarging at Demise. After his head stops spinning, Tankkor growls 
and 
> transforms back into tank mode. With his engin reving, and a stream 
of mech 
> fluid running from his know wounded head, he charges full speed at 
Endbringer.
> 
>        Paralysis watches as his chest is suddenly scared with a 
thin stream 
> of mech, and then suddenly the pain catches up with the quick 
slice. He grabs 
> his shoulder and groans, dropping to one knee.
>        Aerostreak sees his commrad drop, and bursts into the air, 
arms 
> extended and two with two  shoulder mounted plasma cannons armed. 
His jet 
> gives a scream as he flys at top speed over to Paralysis, and as he 
gets 
> closer he unloads three pairs of shots from the cannons.
> 
>        Hell Beast, and Gremlin, ducking behinde a snao bank fire at 
the 
> Nightmares and thier partners as they approach.
> 
>        Megatron slams his fist down. Tarantulas, Nighteyes, 
Aquarious, 
> Paddletail, Waspinator, Adrax, Black Aracnia, and Quickstrike fill 
the Ice 
> Cave as the battle at the foot of the mountian rages on.
>        "Tarantulas, keep a visual on them at all times. Black 
Aracnia, how is 
> QUickstrike?" Megatron says, his head filled with pain.
>        "Hes still groggy, but I think I ought to go out 
there...with my 
> troops." She said, loading her crossbow as she approaches.
>        Megatron nods, and she departs. He wants to go out there, 
but with no 
> one to maintain command in here it would be to easy for something 
to happen. 
> And he didnt trust the arachnid behinde the control panel.
